name: Snowy Mountain ornament
description: The Snowy Mountain ornament is an easy cute pattern, suitable for the beginners.
languages: Additional languages which are not in the download: Russian
full_text: The Snowy Mountain ornament is an easy cute pattern, suitable for the beginners. You can hang a finished mountains on your Christmas tree or make a year-around garland. There are 2 sizes of the mountains in the pattern. Smaller is 7 cm high and the bigger is 10 cm high. It´s not required to meet the established gauge, you can use any kind of yarn, but the size of the finished item will change accordingly. The pattern is a great stash buster! Find me on Instagram: @thiscosynest
